mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM `repair` AS r1 INNER JOIN `maintainxm` AS r2 ON(r1.`wmid` = r2.`xid`) INNER JOIN `income` AS r3 ON(r1.`wincomeid` = r3.`yid`)
or wmname like concat('%',#{wmname},'%')
mapper.sql: wid, wmid, wmname, wincomeid, wremark, wsprice, wmemberprice, wvipice, wdeal, wclaim, wicbcprice, wsum, wpriceclass, wyhqianprice, wthhouprice, wyhhouamount, wproblem, wdescribe, bjid, ygid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from repair
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into repair (wid, wmid, wmname, wincomeid, wremark, wsprice, wmemberprice, wvipice, wdeal, wclaim, wicbcprice, wsum, wpriceclass, wyhqianprice, wthhouprice, wyhhouamount, wproblem, wdescribe, bjid, ygid) values (#{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wincomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wmemberprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wvipice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wdeal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wclaim,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wicbcprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wsum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wpriceclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wyhqianprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wthhouprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wyhhouamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wproblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ygid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into repair
wid,
wmid,
wmname,
wincomeid,
wremark,
wsprice,
wmemberprice,
wvipice,
wdeal,
wclaim,
wicbcprice,
wsum,
wpriceclass,

wthhouprice,

bjid,

mapper.update:
update repair
wid = #{record.wid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wmid = #{record.wmid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wmname = #{record.wmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wincomeid = #{record.wincomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wremark = #{record.wremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wsprice = #{record.wsprice,jdbcType=REAL},
wmemberprice = #{record.wmemberprice,jdbcType=REAL},

ygid = #{record.ygid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update repair set wid = #{record.wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wmid = #{record.wmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wmname = #{record.wmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wincomeid = #{record.wincomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wremark = #{record.wremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsprice = #{record.wsprice,jdbcType=REAL}, wmemberprice = #{record.wmemberprice,jdbcType=REAL}, wvipice = #{record.wvipice,jdbcType=REAL}, wdeal = #{record.wdeal,jdbcType=REAL}, wclaim = #{record.wclaim,jdbcType=REAL}, wicbcprice = #{record.wicbcprice,jdbcType=REAL}, wsum = #{record.wsum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wpriceclass = #{record.wpriceclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wyhqianprice = #{record.wyhqianprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wthhouprice = #{record.wthhouprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wyhhouamount = #{record.wyhhouamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wproblem = #{record.wproblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wdescribe = #{record.wdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjid = #{record.bjid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ygid = #{record.ygid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

wmid = #{wmid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wmname = #{wmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wincomeid = #{wincomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
